column1: Sponsor shall use best efforts to respond in writing to such Change Order promptly.
Sponsor must not use best efforts to respond in writing to such Change Order promptly.
CBSI will appoint a CBSI representative (the "Program Manager") to be responsible for the completion of the Program by CBSI.
CBSI may appoint a CBSI representative (the "Program Manager") to be responsible for the completion of the Program by CBSI.
CBSI will retain the originals in its archives.
CBSI may retain the originals in its archives.
